example.name: transitive
example.text: Whatever the outcome of a test case [*T*-4] , President Bush would have [*-2] to move cautiously becase the very attempt would `` antagonize not just Democrats but Republicans , '' says [*T*-3] Louis Fisher , a scholar at the Congressional Research Service who [*T*-1] specializes in executive-legislative relations .
